executive_summary.key_insight: Aquablu has exceptional customer value potential through predictive maintenance and real-time sustainability dashboards, but needs to fix data integration before scaling AI solutions.

not_recommended.title: Full ERP Replacement with AI
not_recommended.reason: Current budget insufficient for enterprise ERP overhaul; focus on point solutions first

not_recommended.title: Custom AI Chatbot for Customer Support
not_recommended.reason: No indication of high-volume support tickets; resources better spent on operational efficiency

mid_term.title: Conduct Comprehensive AI Readiness Analysis
mid_term.description: Work with AI consultant to perform detailed assessment of your business model, data infrastructure, team capabilities, and strategic goals to create personalized recommendations.
mid_term.expected_outcome: Custom AI implementation strategy with specific tool recommendations, ROI projections, and risk mitigation plans

mid_term.title: Implement First AI Pilot Project
mid_term.description: Deploy initial AI solution based on assessment results, focusing on highest-impact, lowest-risk opportunity with clear success metrics.
mid_term.expected_outcome: Proven AI value delivery with measurable business impact and lessons learned for scaling

long_term.title: Scale Successful AI Implementations
long_term.description: Expand proven AI solutions to additional business areas and integrate advanced AI capabilities based on pilot project learnings and business growth.
long_term.expected_outcome: AI-enhanced business operations delivering sustained competitive advantage and measurable ROI across multiple departments

short_term.title: Complete Business Assessment Survey
short_term.description: Fill out the comprehensive business analysis questionnaire to identify your company's specific AI implementation opportunities, current pain points, and readiness level.
short_term.expected_outcome: Clear understanding of which business processes are prime candidates for AI enhancement and preliminary ROI estimates

short_term.title: Document Current Business Processes
short_term.description: Map out your key business workflows, identify bottlenecks, and quantify time spent on repetitive tasks that could benefit from automation.
short_term.expected_outcome: Detailed process documentation with baseline metrics for measuring future AI implementation success

assumptions: Hourly rate assumed at €50 unless specified
Vendor pricing as of report generation date
limitations: Market conditions may affect vendor availability/pricing
Recommendations should be validated with actual business data
data_sources: Quiz responses provided by business owner
Industry benchmarks from our knowledge base
methodology_notes.confidence_notes: Findings marked as 'high' confidence have multiple supporting data points. 'Medium' confidence items are based on industry patterns. 'Low' confidence items are estimates requiring validation.
